an3.113:1: "Tayome, bhikkhave, āpāyikā nerayikā idamappahāya. Katame tayo? Yo ca abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño, yo ca suddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carantaṁ amūlakena abrahmacariyena anuddhaṁseti, yo cāyaṁ evaṁvādī evaṁdiṭṭhi:  ‘Natthi kāmesu doso’ti, so tāya kāmesu pātabyataṁ āpajjati. Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo āpāyikā nerayikā idamappahāyā"ti.
